grants.title: MOVE fellowships
grants.body:
### What we support

One fellowship to cover a short-term research stay at a MOVE host lab in Europe.

### Grant size

max. DKK 15.000

### Eligibility

PhD students, postdocs, research technicians

grants.title: Sandwich grants
grants.body:
### What we support

Basic catering (sandwiches and refreshments) at local meetings.

### Grant size

DSEV allocates a total budget of max. DKK 5.000 per semester

### Eligibility

Local EV community
